= Selenium =
== Run tests ==
 # Start selenium server from command line (take editor/lib/selenium-server.jar ): 
{{{
java -jar selenium-server.jar -ensureCleanSession -trustAllSSLCertificates
}}}
 # Run any test suite from editor/test/selenium/tests
 # To modify browser configuration (default: Firefox), see editor/test/selenium/util/OryxSeleneseTestCase.java _(TODO: should be a settings file!)_

== Write tests ==
 * Use `OryxSeleneseTestCase#proc` object if selenese helper methods aren't available for a specific selenium command, e.g.
{{{
String[] args = {"css=#username"};
proc.doCommand("waitForElementPresent", args);
}}}
